Name: Children's Jigsaw Puzzles - Beautifully Illustrated
About the game: This puzzle game helps your kids develop matching and fine motor skills. Your children will just love these wonderfully hand-drawn pictures and will improve their spatial skills while having fun! FEATURES: - Perfect for ages 2 - 12. - Rotation mode for greater challenge. - Many bright puzzle images. - Colorful puzzling atmosphere. - Traditional puzzle gameplay. - Simple controls make it easy to solve picture!
